Daniel Green wrote:
>
> Hey all,
>
> We're trying to run Heritrix on a site that populates its menus with
> Javascript after the page is loaded; is this something Heritrix
> supports? I ask because it doesn't seem to be picking them up.
>





Heritrix doesn't do anything clever w/ JS.  It just regexes over the 
script looking for link possibilities.
St.Ack


>
> Thanks,
>
> Daniel Green
>
>
